title: Ep187 Sorority Crimes
description: This week, the gals swallow the sisterhood pill and take a peek inside Greek life. Topics include the dark history of hazing, an email lashing for the history books, and the tragic death (and coverup) of two promising pledges. Pour a Solo cup full of Beringer White Zinfandel, embrace dorm life, and tune in for Sorority Crimes.  For a full list of show sponsors, visit
itunes:summary:
This week, the gals swallow the sisterhood pill and take a peek inside Greek life. Topics include the dark history of hazing, an email lashing for the history books, and the tragic death (and coverup) of two promising pledges. Pour a Solo cup full of Beringer White Zinfandel, embrace dorm life, and tune in for Sorority Crimes.
